legacy.full_text: Dhole, known as the rarest canid in Asia, is rare and normally very hard to see. Now all that’s changed thanks to a bank of infrared cameras in Tongbiguan Provincial Nature Reserve in Yunnan, bringing up fresh insights into the lives of the dhole population every day. https://t.co/eta3ZS9OQ3
